mapper.select: select a.article_id, a.article_title, a.article_content, a.article_cover, a.category_id, t.tag_id, a.is_draft, a.is_top from myblog.tb_article a,myblog.tb_tag t,myblog.tb_article_tag at where a.article_id = at.article_id and t.tag_id =at.tag_id and a.article_id = #{articleId}
select t.tag_name from myblog.tb_article a,myblog.tb_article_tag at,myblog.tb_tag t where a.article_id = at.article_id and at.tag_id = t.tag_id and a.article_id = #{id}

select a.article_id, a.article_title, a.article_content, a.article_cover, a.is_top, a.create_time, c.category_id, c.category_name from myblog.tb_article a,myblog.tb_category c where a.category_id = c.category_id order by a.is_top desc limit #{current},1;

select a.article_id, a.article_title, a.article_content, a.article_cover, a.create_time, a.update_time, c.category_id, c.category_name from myblog.tb_article a,myblog.tb_category c where a.category_id = c.category_id and a.article_id = #{articleId}
